conditions.name: Is ready
conditions.description: True when the Facebook API has loaded and is ready to be used.

conditions.name: Is user logged in
conditions.description: True if currently being viewed inside Facebook by a logged in user.

conditions.name: On user logged in
conditions.description: Triggered when the user successfully logs in.

conditions.name: On user logged out
conditions.description: Triggered when the user logs out.

conditions.name: On name available
conditions.description: Triggered after login when the user's name becomes available.

actions.name: Log in
actions.description: Log the user in to the application so their details can be accessed.

params.name: Permissions
params.description: Requested permissions, separated by a comma. E.g. "public_profile".

actions.name: Prompt wall post
actions.description: Bring up a dialog where the user can share some text on their wall or choose to cancel.

actions.name: Prompt to share this app
actions.description: Bring up a dialog where the user can share a link to the app on their wall or choose to cancel.

actions.name: Prompt to share link
actions.description: Bring up a dialog where the user can share a link on their wall or choose to cancel.

actions.name: Publish wall post
actions.description: Publish a message to the user's wall.  The user should explicitly initiate this.

params.name: Message
params.description: The text to publish to the user's feed.  It is recommended to only do this when the user initiates the action.

actions.name: Publish link
actions.description: Publish a link to the user's wall.  The user should explicitly initiate this.

params.name: Message
params.description: The text to publish to the user's feed.  It is recommended to only do this when the user initiates the action.

params.name: Caption
params.description: The caption appearing beneath the link text.

params.name: Description
params.description: The description appearing beneath the caption.

params.name: Picture URL (optional)
params.description: The URL of an image on your server to use on the Share dialog.  Must include the http://

actions.name: On CTA click
actions.description: In a Facebook Playable Ad, use this action when the user interacts with the call-to-action (CTA) in the ad.

expressions.name: FullName
expressions.description: Get the user's full name, if they are logged in.

expressions.name: FirstName
expressions.description: Get the user's first name, if they are logged in.

expressions.name: LastName
expressions.description: Get the user's last name, if they are logged in.

expressions.name: UserIDStr
expressions.description: Get the user's ID as a string, which is different even for users with the same name.
